attributes.action: Stop the Scottish government from imposing taxation, higher than the U.K.
attributes.background:
We the people, that have signed this petition, request the intervention from the UK government, to revoke the right of Holyrood, to adjust taxation that is higher than our UK counterparts.

The people of Scotland decided, right or wrong, to be part of the UK and demand the same UK taxation levels.

rejection.details: We're not sure whether you'd like all powers of taxation to be returned from the Scottish Parliament to the UK Parliament, or whether you would like the Scottish Parliament to have the power to set lower taxes than the UK.
